EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We hope by now you’ve had a chance to browse your partner portal and see the exciting new resources at your disposal. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, We hope by now you’ve had a chance to browse your partner portal and see the exciting new resources at your disposal. Make sure to check out the Getting Started page <[[http://partners.bigcommerce.com/English/]]>, which has quick links to all of your portal activities:
- Have a client interested in Bigcommerce? Let us know about the opportunity so you get paid. - Need to get trained? Learn more about the Bigcommerce platform. - Want to celebrate your partnership? Tell the world that you're a Bigcommerce Partner. - Looking for marketing resources? Use our tools to help you sell more. - Want to see your account? See the details of your partnership.
Get started now <[[http://partners.bigcommerce.com/English/]]>
Need assistance? Register for an onboarding webinar <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/Portal-Webinar-Register.html]]>. Thank you, The Bigcommerce Partner Team partnersupport@bigcommerce.com <[[mailto:partnersupport@bigcommerce.com]]>
